amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 116-302 to include procedures to provide information about available trauma and related counseling for employees in reporting, incident response, and post-incident investigation procedures.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 116-302 to include procedures to provide information about available trauma and related counseling for employees in reporting, incident response, and post-incident investigation procedures.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. DeSaulnier.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
